I would like to have a "high energy" mode for characters.  If a 
character has a maximum of 10,000 units of mana or more, this mode 
would define most (wouldn't effect the creation of new characters) 
attacks as percentages of available mana.  This would leave to much 
more powerfull attacks.  The downside of this is using "high energy 
mode" attacks against characters with spells of protections around 
them because that is very wastefull of mana to do damage (in hand to 
hand combat, an archmage fairs very poorly against characters with 
spells of protection around them, but has no problems against regular 
characters).
